prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies the concept of creation and has a celestial theme.
I want a powerful legendary Pokemon with an ethereal appearance and divine attributes.
Generate a Pokemon that represents the balance of nature, with elements of light and shadow.
Make a majestic creature with a horse-like body and shimmering, radiant colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate space and time, featuring intricate patterns on its body.
Design a legendary being with a sleek, streamlined form and glowing accents throughout.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a combination of elegance and strength, radiating an aura of mystery.

distinctive_features: Four legs with a horse-like appearance
A distinctive ring-like structure on its back
